data.name: Info
data.value:
Hellowo! I'm owobot {0} - a bot that sends cute anime girls!
I am written in C# using .NET 6, taking data from Booru websites and reddit. I'm also multi-threaded. Don't be afraid to send me 25-50 requests at a time, I can handle it!
If you’re tired of reading and you want to see anime girls already, then proceed with: /get By default, I will not send you NSFW content, however you can configure this using next command: /nsfw You can also change the language by sending: /language
A few words about privacy - I save only the settings for each user and chat. My GitHub page: https://github.com/Rasmus715/owobot-csharp
I hope that I will be useful to you, master!! (☆ω☆)

data.name: SetLanguage
data.value: Understood! From now, I'll answer you in English!

data.name: Start
data.value:
Konichiwa, {0}!
To get more information type /info For a quick start, just type /get
Also click on the slash icon at the keyboard to see full command list.

data.name: Status
LanguageInfo
data.value:
Oa! Are you decided to change language?
At this moment used language to response is English. Here is what you can do: /language_en to switch to English. /language_ru чтобы переключится на русский.

data.name: ReturnPic
GetStatus
data.value:
Write to the bot /get_*subreddit tittle* and it will send you a random picture from there.
Here is my little compilation for you: /get_AnimeART - The biggest place with anime pics. /get_awwnime - All kinds of moe art. /get_wholesomeyuri - Yuri. Everyone loves yuri. /get_Joshi_Kosei - Cute high school students. /get_AnimeBlush - Shy girls. /get_tsunderes - Cute tsunderes! /get_Usagimimi - Bunny girls! /get_kitsunemimi - Cat girls! /get_animeponytails - Cute ponytail girls. /get_tyingherhairup - Anime girls tying their hair up. /get_OfficialSenpaiHeat - Compilation of pictures. /get_ChurchofBelly - Tummies! /get_Moescape - Cute arts with cute girls. /get_MoeStash - More cute girls! /get_TwoDeeArt - Just 2D Art. /get_headpats - Girls getting a pat. /get_cutelittlefangs - Teeth and fangs and cute girls. /get_kemonomimi - Cute girls and animal ears! /get_twintails - Anime girls with twintails. /get_pouts - Cute girls with pouting cheeks. /get_gao - Girls make scary sounds! /get_animelegs - Legs! /get_ZettaiRyouiki - Thighs owo! /get_thighdeology - More thighs, but more open! /get_Animewallpaper - Beautiful wallpapers with cute girls. /get_pantsu - Pantsu shots owo! /get_Patchuu - Abstract, surreal, or just beautiful girls! /get_animehotbeverages - Girls drink hot drinks. /get_AnimeLounging - Cute girls are resting. /get_silverhair - Girls with silver hair. /get_longhairedwaifus - Cuties with long hair. /get_shorthairedwaifus - Girls with short hairstyles. /get_Smugs - Smug girls. /get_manga - Manga pages. /get_Lain - W̺̹̆̒ͪ͌̒ͦe͂̈́ ̜͕̮͉̥̔ͪ̃͗ͣa͛ͤ̌ŕ̭̈́̎̈ͯ͋e̠̤̫̪͙ͩͨ ͉̘̱͔̥͊͂́̍ͦ́ẃ̰̼̰͌̇iͧ̀̉ͫr͖̗̙̫̓e̥̣̲ͨ̄͌̑d̲͉̭̩̟̙̝͆ͥ
/random - random picture from booru websites (konachan, yande.re) /random_reddit - random picture from a subreddit, listed above

data.name: NsfwStatus
data.value:
Oagh! Have you decided to change the NSFW content settings?
Currently NSFW is: {0}. Here is what you can do: /nsfw_on to turn on the lewds /nsfw_off to turn off all the erotic
*No guarantee that all NSFW tags in reddit are correct!

data.name: SetNsfwOn
data.value: Got it! Now the lewds are enabled in this chat! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

data.name: SetNsfwOff
data.value: Understood. No more vulgarity in this chat!

data.value: Ehmm... You should read carefully about the commands in /nsfw

I was told not to post NSFW posts! I can not show you this picture, sorry (｡ŏ﹏ŏ)
